part.comment: The following is known as a sporadic event; this happens eventually on any day between 2011-10-20 and 2011-10-21.
part.narration: Takuya observes and sighs. He folds his language-book on itself. Yuki watches him.
part.line: I've fallen for a different-gender of different-landing.
Not you! What do I look like, a toddler-toucher?
part.narration: Camera zoom out.Nestled in the alfresco seat of the half-bar is Lori Ciel.
part.line: I want her hand, but I doubt not that countless same-landed men have sought her.
To her, I need to be someone new, someone unique—
So I had at her tongue in hopes that I may have at her lips.
part.narration: The leaves of the freshly-planted half-bar trees rustle against one another. The wind turns Lori's hair aflame. She sips her chamomile and returns to the alien extermination game held in hand.Give the Player the illusion of inconsequentiality with the event; let her know she can can continue walking, but not that where and how she walks decides the outcome.

choice.line: I'll talk to her for you.
choice.narration: Takuya trips over himself and shuffles through the book and the book has phrases and the book tells him about the words like "sélective" and "intrépide" and "séduisant—"

condition.narration: Yuki stops and turns back in Takuya's direction.
Yuki turns around and walks back towards Lori.
condition.line: Have you met my friend Takuya?
condition.narration: The two look each other eye to eye. Takuya grins hard and fast.

choice.narration: Yuki for a long time stays nearer to Takuya.The Player may still walk around, affecting the outcome of this choice.
choice.line: She sits around a three-fourth of the day and I pay her top dollar.
She leaves us and loafs around, hair a-blow in wind because it looks cool.
Even now, she is no more elegant than a rock.
I apologize. You are not satisfied with my performance.
I am satisfied. You are the worst concierge except for all the other ones.
choice.narration: The two sit for a while. Takuya pretends to pay no mind.
Yuki is right next to Lori. Yuki snatches the handheld.
choice.line: The end of the world is coming.
Everyone's huddling together to stay warm.
Someone's over there itching to sweep you off your feet.
It is why I have sat here, appearing to do something mundane.
Bored women are easy targets. Confirm?
choice.narration: Lori walks over to Takuya. They grin at each other very loudly.
Lori nods. Takuya takes her hand. Camera zoom out to show where Lori just came from - the half-bar.

choice.comment: Every day when work ends, Takuya and Lori immediately pair up and leave the building. Player cannot enter party with hobby events with Takuya or Lori until 2011-11-01.
Both Takuya and Lori's base morale fall sharply for the duration of the game.
